detail.description:
Hello Pag-IBIG is the companion app of the Pag-IBIG Loyalty Card Plus powered by AUB.

Download the Hello Pag-IBIG app and register your Pag-IBIG Loyalty Card Plus powered by AUB now to enjoy digital financial services that is secure, fast and efficient.

Sa Hello Pag-IBIG app, you can manage your funds conveniently, anytime, anywhere!

- Maaari mong makita sa Hello Pag-IBIG app kung credited na ang iyong loan proceeds.
- Mag-ipon at maghulog sa inyong Pag-IBIG MP2 savings
- Magbayad ng inyong monthly loan amortization sa housing loan, multi-purpose loan at calamity loan sa Pag-IBIG.

I-enjoy ang iba pang karagdagang services tulad ng

- Real time fund transfer to other banks and ewallets via InstaPay
- Makatanggap ng pera gamit ang iyong sariling QR PH code na ma-gegenerate sa iyong Hello Pag-IBIG app.
- Makapag CASH IN or top up sa mga 711 branches nationwide.
- Makapag PERA PADALA to your loved ones through our cash out partners (Cebuana Lhuiller, Palawan, LBC Express, M. Lhuiller and AUB branches)
- Bumili ng PREPAID LOAD (Globe, Smart, Sun, PLDT, Meralco, DITO)
- Magbayad ng BILLS for electricity, credit cards, tuition fees, at iba pang utilities.
- Makapag SCAN TO PAY via QR code sa kahit saang QR PH P2M merchant nationwide.
- Mag-online shopping gamit ang Hello Pag-IBIG Virtual Mastercard.
- Mag-withdraw gamit ang iyong Pag-IBIG Loyalty Card Plus sa lahat ng BancNet ATMs or i-swipe ito at gamiting pambayad sa groceries at ibang shops, nationwide.

I-register na ang iyong Pag-IBIG Loyalty Card Plus powered by AUB today!
